name: Pedro Adao
what_you_do: Pedro Adao is an entrepreneur known for running online challenge-based marketing programs and teaching business owners how to use challenges to grow their audience and generate leads.
who_you_serve: Pedro serves entrepreneurs and business owners looking to enhance their marketing strategies and achieve business growth through innovative challenge frameworks.
current_projects: Challenge Secrets book launch, Kingdom Seekers motivational app
social_proof: 8-figure entrepreneur, best-selling author, 10-time ClickFunnels 2 Comma Club Winner, recipient of ClickFunnels X & C Club Awards.
bio: 8-figure entrepreneur, best-selling author, 10-time ClickFunnels 2 Comma Club Winner, recipient of ClickFunnels X & C Club Awards.
business_focus: Pedro Adao is an entrepreneur known for running online challenge-based marketing programs and teaching business owners how to use challenges to grow their audience and generate leads. (business challenges)
